医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
WPI研究人员将获得NSF职业奖，以为医疗应用创建生物粘附剂伍斯特理工学院（WPI）研究人员正在通过将水凝胶和类似胶状的聚合物汇总在一起，以安全可靠地将人体组织与植入体内的治疗装置（例如起搏器，胰岛素泵和人造关节）一起开发新的医学胶粘剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/wpi-researcher-receives-nsf-career-award-award-to-to-create-create-bioadhisives-for for-Medical-Applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/wpi-researcher-receives-nsf-career-award-to-create-create-bioeate-bioadhisives-for for-medical-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38E5B249-F9F3-4790-A1E2-E76D17FD1225 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 23:00:32 -0400 WPI researcher receives NSF CAREER Award to create bioadhesives for medical applications
研究揭示了喷气滞后如何影响睡眠时间和恢复Nus Yong Yong lin医学院（NUS Medicine）的睡眠和认知中心研究人员进行的一项合作研究发现，虽然睡眠持续时间迅速恢复，但在跨时区旅行时，睡眠时间和睡眠体系结构可能需要更长的时间才能重新调整。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-reveals-how-jet-jet-lag-actects-sleep-timing-indiming-and-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-reveals-how-jet-jet-lag-actects-sleep-timing-indiming-and-timing-and-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51731E33-AC0A-4B48-A110-6EED2E91FB79 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 22:55:14 -0400 Study reveals how jet lag affects sleep timing and recovery
关于肌动脉症如何破坏肌肉功能的新见解患有自身免疫性疾病的人肌无力的肌肉无力，可能会影响我们用来眨眼，微笑甚至移动身体的任何肌肉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new-insights-into-how-how-myasthenia-myasthenia-gravis-antibodies-distrupp--distrupt-muscle-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new-insights-into-how-how-myasthenia-gravis-antibodies-distrupp--distrupp--muscle-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4A710188-4BAF-42ED-AF74-5F8777228340B Wed, 09 Apr 2025 22:44:49 -0400 New insights into how myasthenia gravis antibodies disrupt muscle function
新的智能服装跟踪一个人的姿势和锻炼康奈尔大学（Cornell University）的研究人员开发了一种新型的智能服装，可以跟踪一个人的姿势和运动锻炼，但看起来像普通衬衫一样，看起来，穿着和洗涤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new-smart-clothing-tracks-a-person-posture-and-posture-and-cercise-routine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new-smart-clothing-tracks-a-a-person-posture-and-posture-and-cercise-recercise-routine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb262a48-06c2-4545-aab0-aab0-ebf869851ea5 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 22:32:34 -0400 New smart clothing tracks a person's posture and exercise routine
